body.p: To His excellency Thos E Bramlett Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, we the undersign citizens of Boyd County most respectively petition your Excellency to remitt a fine agst our fellow Citizen Thos Thriplett of a fine amounting to fifty dollars for keeping a Tippling house which was found agst him at the October term of the Boyd Circuit Court in 1865 we are satisfied that said Tripplett did not sell the whiskey for the purpose of vollilalating the laws of this Commonwealth and said inditement was found on the evidence of a person that had ill feelings towards said Tripplett. As said Tripplett is an honest and up right man Therefore ask your excllency to remitt said fine
